Whew Bruce, glad you said that.  I thought I was going crazy getting the same posts over and over.  Talk about flash backs.   ron l

bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:           Finaly!! a voice in the wilderness.
 
Thank you Ann and Misty, and after only 4 posts I got feedback from two people.
 
The reason I wanted this specific file to be heard was that I thought it was perfect validation
that at least some of our human physical emotions stay with us when we cross.
 
I was looking for someone to pick up and comment on that.
 
bruce


  Bruce Halliday 




    
---------------------------------
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
From: lisby@...
Date: Mon, 4 Feb 2008 13:47:22 -0500
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] they do get annoyed sometimes_fourth post

      I hear it, Bruce.   

  Ann
  
    On Feb 4, 2008, at 12:20 PM, bhali333 wrote:

          Here is a perfect example of my "Technition" Lisa getting frustrated
with me asking the same question like 4 times due to the fact that I
usually hear the answer to this question live but did not this time.

when I finally did she said "Yes" in a like sort of "ok enough already"
tone of voice.

the file goes "any spirit came threw can you let me know if they are
back_YESSSSSS.wav

Also this is a question I ask due to the fact that I believe entities
can travel back and forth across the open line of live communication.

Bruce
